name: UnorderedMap
description: This Library is an easy to use Library for Unordered Maps. This Library contains basic implementations of an Unordered Map. Please note that this library has been mostly tested but may not be completely stable. If you find any bugs, please report them to the Author
Description: This Library makes it easy to map a key to a value. It Utilizes the Hashtable Library (Designed by the same author) to create an UnorderedMap. Please note that this means it can use a bit more memory then just using the Hashtable Directly. This Library is designed to be simple and easy to use. This Library contains basic implementations of a UnorderedMap Structure. Please note that this library is still in development. Although it has been mostly tested and considered stable, bugs can till appear. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK! If you find any bugs, please report them to the Author
Notes: This Library is a Wrapper Library. It is built on the Hashtable Library but does not extend all features. You Can still use the Hashtable Library directly if you need more features. This Library is designed to be simple and easy to use. This Library contains basic implementations of a UnorderedMap Structure. Please note that this library is still in development. Although it has been mostly tested and considered stable, bugs can till appear. USE AT YOUR OWN RISK! If you find any bugs, please report them to the Author

changes: Removed UnorderedMap.cpp and moved all code to UnorderedMap.h
Added Duplicate check on set Function
Rebuilt library to utilize hashtable as its underlying structure. This allows for faster lookups and better memory usage
This also means, since the Hashtable has already been tested, this library is considered stable and ready for use
Added a few more functions that Hashtable does not have.
Modified the Constructor to take in a ```bool``` value to determine if the UnorderedMap should display debug messages. Default is ```false```

Adjusted the ```remove``` function to return a ```bool``` value to determine if the key was found and removed or not... Since it calls for Hashtabes remove, it now properly calls the Hashtable remove function.
Removed Debug Messages to save memory space, Will implement a version with debug messages later.
Added Function Comments to all functions
Updates to keyword Search in Library.json file
